title: KILLSWITCH ENGAGE Announces European Tour With HATEBREED, FIT FOR AN AUTOPSY, DECAPITATED & EMPLOYED TO SERVE
description: Depending on where you see 'em, anyway. The post KILLSWITCH ENGAGE Announces European Tour With HATEBREED, FIT FOR AN AUTOPSY, DECAPITATED & EMPLOYED TO SERVE appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 4 hours ago
excerpt: Depending on where you see 'em, anyway.
text: Killswitch Engage has announced a European tour for later this year featuring Decapitated, Hatebreed, Fit for an Autopsy, and Employed to Serve (depending on which dates you attend). The whole tour kicks off on September 29 in Lisbon, Portugal at the LAV venue, and wraps up on December 3 at the House of Culture in Helsinki, Finland. Get your tickets here. "I am very eager to get to share the stage with top tier bands like Decapitated, Hatebreed, Fit for an Autopsy, and Employed to Serve!" said Killswitch Engage vocalist Jesse Leach. "This is a monster of a line up and an opportunity to play some of these new songs as well as a solid mix from our catalogue! Headlining over in Europe and the U.K. is well overdue as it's been about six years since we last were able to do this! I am certain this will be a tour that will absolutely turn heads and make for some great memories!" Killswitch Engage, Fit for an Autopsy, Decapitated & Employed to Serve 9/29 Portugal Lisbon LAV10/1 Spain Madrid La Riviera10/2 Spain Barcelona Razzmatazz10/4 Italy Milan Fabrique10/5 Switzerland Zurich Halle 62210/6 France Paris Bataclan Killswitch Engage, Hatebreed, Fit for an Autopsy & Decapitated 10/8 UK Wolverhampton Civic Hall10/9 UK Manchester Manchester Academy10/11 UK Newcastle NX10/12 UK Cardiff Depot10/13 UK Leeds O2 Academy Leeds10/15 Scotland Glasgow O2 Academy10/17 UK London OVO Wembley Arena10/19 Northern Ireland Belfast Telegraph Building10/20 Ireland Dublin National Stadium Killswitch Engage, Fit for an Autopsy, Decapitated & Employed to Serve 11/20 Germany Cologne Palladium11/21 Germany Ludwigsburg MHP Arena11/22 Germany Berlin Columbiahalle11/24 Czech Republic Prague SasaZu11/25 Germany Leipzig Haus Auensee11/27 Germany Hamburg Sporthalle11/28 Denmark Copenhagen Amager Bio11/29 Sweden Stockholm Fallan12/1 Norway Oslo Sentrum Scene12/3 Finland Helsinki House of Culture Want More Metal? html:
Killswitch Engage has announced a European tour for later this year featuring Decapitated, Hatebreed, Fit for an Autopsy, and Employed to Serve (depending on which dates you attend). The whole tour kicks off on September 29 in Lisbon, Portugal at the LAV venue, and wraps up on December 3 at the House of Culture in Helsinki, Finland. Get your tickets here.

"I am very eager to get to share the stage with top tier bands like Decapitated, Hatebreed, Fit for an Autopsy, and Employed to Serve!" said Killswitch Engage vocalist Jesse Leach.

"This is a monster of a line up and an opportunity to play some of these new songs as well as a solid mix from our catalogue! Headlining over in Europe and the U.K. is well overdue as it's been about six years since we last were able to do this! I am certain this will be a tour that will absolutely turn heads and make for some great memories!"
